shopifyCollection.title: Distinguished Gentlemen's Ride
shopifyCollection.description: A collection to support the 2021 Distinguished Gentleman's Ride, uniting classic and vintage style motorcycle riders all over the world to raise funds and awareness for prostate cancer research and men’s mental health.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: A collection to support the 2021 Distinguished Gentleman's Ride, uniting classic and vintage style motorcycle riders all over the world to raise funds and awareness for prostate cancer research and men’s mental health.

products.title: PRESALE: The Distinguished Gentleman's Ride 2021 Camp Flag
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} The official memento of the 2021 Distinguished Gentleman's Ride 20% of proceeds from this camp flag will be donated to the Distinguished Gentlemen's Ride to raise funds and awareness for prostate cancer research and men’s mental health. Please note, this items is part of a presale and will ship the last week of June. Size: 18" x 24" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design Color: Black body, Cream and Gold details
products.descriptionHtml:
The official memento of the 2021 Distinguished Gentleman's Ride

20% of proceeds from this camp flag will be donated to the Distinguished Gentlemen's Ride to raise funds and awareness for prostate cancer research and men’s mental health.

Please note, this items is part of a presale and will ship the last week of June.

Size: 18" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Black body, Cream and Gold details

Please note, this items is part of a presale and will ship the last week of June. Size: 9" x 27" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Color: Cream body, Black details
